comment.author: 50763379@N08
comment._content:
Hi!. Thanks for the post. FYI, this is NOT a CV-580 but rather a CV-640. The engines are RR Darts rather than the big Allisons used on the 580.  This a/c was originally build as a CV-340 but then re-engined and converted to a freighter.
Commuterman1
rickrohrer1124@sbcglobal.net
